content:
Congratulations on completing your data collection! I'd be happy to help you with your literature review chapter.

To assist you in finding recent studies related to your research topic, could you please share more details about your topic? What is the specific area of research you're investigating? What are the key concepts, variables, or themes you're exploring?

Additionally, what databases or academic search engines have you used so far to search for relevant studies? Have you used any specific keywords or search terms to narrow down your search?

Lastly, since you've just finished collecting data, are you looking for studies published within a specific timeframe (e.g., last 5 years, last 2 years)? This can help me provide more targeted suggestions.

Please provide me with more information, and I'll do my best to help you find recent studies relevant to your research topic.
